meanings.definition: The time of day when light first appears in the sky, before the sun rises.
meanings.sent1: At daybreak, the birds start chirping.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, I wake up at daybreak.
meanings.sent3: The early riser always catches the worm at daybreak.
meanings.sent4: The daybreak of a new era brought hope to the people.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of daybreak is unmatched by any other time of day.

meanings.definition: The beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent1: The farmer begins his work at daybreak.
meanings.sent2: We welcome each day with joy at daybreak.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock always rings at daybreak, startling me awake.
meanings.sent4: With each daybreak, we have a chance to start anew.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sky at daybreak are like a painting come to life.
